name: Death of the Party
description:
MC Gravewave is slightly famous for his righteously gloomy parties at Club Colvahrt. You've finally managed to catch a bus that stops nearby there, now you can attend one of these parties yourself! 

Are you cool enough to meet the mildly legendary MC?

Use the arrow keys to move, especially during the ritual.

Hold the Z key to perform the ritual, keep an eye out.

Hold the X key to carry things if you're purple.

Press the C key to interact with things or people.
